articles.title: Helmut Marko - Sergio Perez has 'woken up from championship dream' - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Helmut Marko has given a remarkably frank assessment of Red Bull driver Sergio Perez, saying the Mexican has finally "woken up" from his dream of becoming a Formula One champion.

articles.title: Ishan Kishan Breaks Sachin Tendulkar's 29-year-old Record During 2nd IND-WI ODI - Times Now
articles.description: Star Indian wicketkeeper-batsman Ishan Kishan broke a massive record set by legendary Sachin Tendulkar in 1994 by scoring a fifty in the second ODI against the West Indies on Saturday (July 29). The 35-year-old left-handed batter reached the No. 1 position on…
